last_episode_to_air.name: Major and Minor (2)
last_episode_to_air.overview:
Spence's nephew, Jack, persuades him to undergo a brain scan to program a protype VR soldier.The experiment goes Wrong and Jessica becomes the target of the soldier.

M.A.J.O.R. Stands for Morphizing Acrylonitrile JPS particle Organic Replica

name: Thunder in Paradise
overview: Thunder in Paradise was a one-hour action-adventure TV series from the creators of Baywatch, which starred Hulk Hogan, Chris Lemmon, and Carol Alt. This first-run syndicated TV series originally premiered as a straight-to-video feature film in September 1993, then ran for one season in 1994, before being cancelled. The series was later rebroadcast on the TNT cable network.

episodes.name: Thunder in Paradise (1)
episodes.overview: The Gang rescues a Cuban woman and her son.   Spence marries Megan to save her money and pay for   his debts when the government dropes his contract to produce a fleet of Thunderboats. A necklace found in a shark   proves to be the map to a fortune in hidden loot.

episodes.name: Thunder in Paradise (2)
episodes.overview: The Gang rescues a Cuban woman and her son.    Spence marries Megan to save her money and pay for    his debts when the government dropes his contract to produce a fleet of Thunderboats. A necklace found in a shark proves to be the map to a fortune in hidden loot.

episodes.name: Tug of War
episodes.overview: Spence catches a ring of computer thefts

episodes.name: Sea Quentin
episodes.overview: Hammerhead takes over and attempts to escape from an underwater prison

episodes.name: Strange Bru
episodes.overview: A man and a voodoo drug dealer are interrupted and the man runs to a boat which explodes shortly after.  His wife, who is an old flame of Spence, comes and asks Spence to finish him.  Bru is wounded by a poisoned arrow and hallucinates. They all have to take care of with voodoo before it is over.

episodes.name: Sealed With a Kismet (1)
episodes.overview: Romantic tale of capture and rescue as Kelly is swepted off her feet into a Prince's harem to be his redemption

episodes.name: Sealed With a Kismet (2)
episodes.overview: Romantic tale of capture and rescue as Kelly is swepted off her feet into a Prince's harem to be his redemption

episodes.name: Changing of the Guard
episodes.overview: An English inheritance is passed through the female line and an Earl claims Jessica as his daughter.  When Edward takes Jessica to England, the Earl swepts her away to his aunt's castle which has abunch of secret passages and a dungeon.  (Kinda like the board Game Clue)

episodes.name: Gettysburg Change of Address
episodes.overview: Fitch, an Army captain, wants the gang to compete against him in a war game which turns out to be a re-enactment of 'The War Between The States'and with Thunder this proves to be no problem.  Also, Kelly is running a sea sled competition, The Fifth Annual Sea-Doo Invitational Scuttlebutt Pro-Am, and being romanced by an old beau.

episodes.name: Distant Shout of Thunder
episodes.overview: A tugboat captain, who accidentally blows up Thunder, joins Spence and Bru as they go to stop an Scottish tycoon who plans to   disrupt the world's banking with a computer virus through the Internet.  Jessica's fortune telling game Breaks the code

episodes.name: Nature of the Beast
episodes.overview: Bru deals with his feelings about the Vietnamese officer   that killed his brother and tortured him many years ago, when the man asks them to find his daughter who went to Bowman Island in search of a rare orchid and never returned.  They encounter a creature made of electrical energy

episodes.name: Identity Crisis
episodes.overview: Hammerhead tricks Spence into making a commercial tape which he edits into a threat to level Miami with a missile unless they pay $100 million.  Meanwhile, Trelawny is recognized by her former fiance whom she left three years ago

episodes.name: Queen of Hearts
episodes.overview: Edward gets a medal from Queen Elizabeth of the UK

episodes.name: Plunder in Paradise
episodes.overview: When Jessica returns, Spence tells this tale of adventure...Modern day pirates raid the coast stealing jewelry and cash and then invade the Indian Burial Groundwhich proves to be a big mistake.

episodes.name: Eye for an Eye
episodes.overview: Another Cuban Rescue

episodes.name: Endangered Species
episodes.overview: Animal poachers catch a wild boy in their net, who was raised by wolves. Spence threatens them and searches their boat finding the boy, who he takes home and attempts to identify as well as protect from the scientists who want to study him.

episodes.name: Deadly Lessons (1)
episodes.overview: A DEA agent asks Spence to help catch a drug lord and his chief assistant. They sneak into his HQ and capture the drug lord. His angered assistant breaks into the school where Kelly is to teach, and Jessica is a student, and takes the school hostage.   Alison, knowing a way in, joins Spence and Bru in the rescue.

episodes.name: Deadly Lessons (2)
episodes.overview: A DEA agent asks Spence to help catch a drug lord and his chief assistant. They sneak into his HQ and capture the drug lord. His angered assistant breaks into the school where Kelly is to teach, and Jessica is a student, and takes the school hostage.   Alison, knowing a way in, joins Spence and Bru in the rescue.

episodes.name: Blast Off
episodes.overview: A terrorist is threatening to blow up a space rocket unless he   gets paid a billion dollars.  There is lots of action as Spence   rides a torpedo and Bru deflects a laser beam.

episodes.name: Dead Reckoning
episodes.overview: Edward and Jessica look for Hulk who has disappeared and stranded on a life raft with Bru and Hammerhead
